statements: UPDATE email_campaign_performance SET open_rate = 20.50, click_through_rate = 15.75 WHERE campaign_id = 1;

UPDATE campaigns SET open_rate = 0.75, click_through_rate = 0.65 WHERE campaign_id = 100
UPDATE subscribers SET last_opened_date = '2021-10-15', status = 'Active' WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com'
UPDATE campaigns SET open_rate = 0.25, click_through_rate = 0.10 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE subscribers SET status = 'Inactive', last_clicked_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE subscriber_id = 5;
UPDATE open_rates SET open_count = 10 WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND open_date = '2022-01-10' AND email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE click_through_rates SET click_count = 5, email_address = 'jane.smith@example.com', click_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE campaign_id = 200;
UPDATE open_rates SET open_count = open_count + 1 WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND open_date = '2022-01-15' AND email_address = 'user1@example.com';
UPDATE click_through_rates SET click_count = click_count - 1, email_address = 'user2@example.com' WHERE campaign_id = 200 AND click_date = '2022-02-20';
UPDATE email_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
